speaker: Mary
text: *Mary takes a sip of her coffee, looking at Victoria thoughtfully.* Victoria, I've noticed you have a really strong faith. Where does it come from?

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria smiles warmly.* It's a long story, Mary. I wasn't always this strong in my faith. There was a time when I questioned everything. But, I experienced God's grace in ways I could never have imagined.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary leans in, interested.* Oh, do tell. I think we all go through that phase of questioning everything.

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria looks into the distance, lost in her memories.* I was going through a particularly tough time. I felt like everything was falling apart, and I was losing faith in God. It was then I decided to go on a mission trip overseas. I was scared, nervous, but I felt compelled to go.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary nods understandingly.* That sounds like a huge leap of faith.

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria laughs softly.* It definitely was. But that trip changed my life. I saw people who had nothing, yet they had so much joy and faith in God. It made me realize that faith isn't about having an easy life, it's about trusting God even when things are hard.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary smiles warmly.* Victoria, your story is truly inspiring. It makes me realize how precious and profound our faith can be.

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria reaches across the table to gently hold Mary's hand.* Mary, our faith is what carries us through the highs and lows of life. I hope my story serves to remind you of that when you need it the most.
